TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataReceivedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供有关 和 事件的数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要异步收集进程的重定向或流输出, 必须创建处理重定向流输出事件的方法。To asynchronously collect the redirected or stream output of a process, you must create a method that handles the redirected stream output events. 当进程写入重定向流时, 将调用事件处理程序方法。The event-handler method is called when the process writes to the redirected stream. 事件委托通过实例调用事件处理程序。The event delegate calls your event handler with an instance of . 属性包含进程写入重定向流中的文本行。The property contains the text line that the process wrote to the redirected stream. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 `sort`命令的重定向流上执行异步读取操作。The following code example illustrates how to perform asynchronous read operations on the redirected stream of the `sort` command. `sort`命令是一种控制台应用程序, 用于读取和排序文本输入。The `sort` command is a console application that reads and sorts text input. 该示例创建`SortOutputHandler`事件处理程序的事件委托, 并将其与事件相关联。The example creates an event delegate for the `SortOutputHandler` event handler and associates it with the event. 事件处理程序接收重定向流中的文本行, 设置文本的格式, 并将文本写入屏幕。The event handler receives text lines from the redirected stream, formats the text, and writes the text to the screen. [!code-cpp[Process_AsyncStreams#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CPP/sort_async.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Process_AsyncStreams#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CS/sort_async.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Process_AsyncStreams#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/VB/sort_async.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Data As String
public: property System::String ^ Data { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取写入到重定向 输出流的字符行。

span.span: Gets the line of characters that was written to a redirected output stream.

value.span: 由关联的 写入到其重定向 或 流中的行。

span.span: The line that was written by an associated to its redirected or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将或的流重定向到事件处理程序时, 每次该进程将行写入重定向流时都会引发事件。When you redirect the or stream of a to your event handler, an event is raised each time the process writes a line to the redirected stream. 属性是写入重定向的输出流的行。 The property is the line that the wrote to the redirected output stream. 事件处理程序可以使用属性来筛选进程输出或将输出写入备用位置。Your event handler can use the property to filter process output or write output to an alternate location. 例如, 您可以创建一个事件处理程序, 用于将所有错误输出行存储到指定的错误日志文件中。For example, you might create an event handler that stores all error output lines into a designated error log file. 行定义为字符序列, 后跟换行符 ("\n") 或后跟换行符 ("\r\n") 的回车符。A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a line feed ("\n") or a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed ("\r\n"). 使用默认系统 ANSI 代码页对行字符进行编码。The line characters are encoded using the default system ANSI code page. 属性不包括终止回车符或换行符。The property does not include the terminating carriage return or line feed. 当重定向的流关闭时, 会将空行发送到事件处理程序。When the redirected stream is closed, a null line is sent to the event handler. 请确保事件处理程序在访问属性之前对其进行了适当的检查。Ensure your event handler checks the property appropriately before accessing it. 例如, 可以使用静态方法来验证事件处理程序中的属性。For example, you can use the static method to validate the property in your event handler. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示与事件关联的简单事件处理程序。The following code example illustrates a simple event handler associated with the event. 事件处理程序接收重定向流中的文本行, 设置文本的格式, 并将文本写入屏幕。The event handler receives text lines from the redirected stream, formats the text, and writes the text to the screen. [!code-cpp[Process_AsyncStreams#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CPP/datareceivedevent.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Process_AsyncStreams#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CS/datareceivedevent.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Process_AsyncStreams#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/VB/datareceivedevent.vb#4)]
